Original meaning 本义: Meaning stolen goods.

English senses 英语理解: booty, loot, stolen goods; bribe

Usage example 用法举例: 贓款 zāng kuǎn (stolen money)

賍字的基本解释

賍
zāng
同“赃”。

賍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zāng］
［《廣韻》則郎切，平唐，精。］
“赃1”的繁体字。亦作“賍1”。亦作“賘1”。亦作“贜1”。
(1)贪污；受贿。
(2)指行贿。
(3)用盗窃、贪污等非法手段获取的财物。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zāng］
["Guangyun" Ze Lang Qi, Ping Tang, Jing. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "貨1". Also known as "賍1". Also known as "賘1". Also known as "贜1".
(1) Corruption; acceptance of bribes.
(2) Refers to bribery.
(3) Property obtained by illegal means such as theft and embezzlement.
